summary: This is a high resolution replacer for the current night sky. Includes a colorful nebula, re-textured moons/starfield. NMM install.
descriptionHtml:
[color=silver]This is a high resolution replacer for the current night sky. Includes a colorful nebula, re-textured moons/starfield.

INSTALLATION:

1. Install via NMM. (recommended)
2. Or for manual installation, drag the \'Data\' folder into your Skyrim directory, merge & overwrite any files.

Credits:

-Paint.net + Various Plug-Ins, I.e Shape 3d.
-Various texture libraries (licence free.)
-Various DeviantART Planet resource textures.
-Adobe Photoshop CS6.[/color]


[color=red]Recommended Mod[/color]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1037]26 Moon Size Tweeks by akindain[/url]

[color=silver]My other mods:[/color]

[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/29304-1-1357865569.png[/img]
[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29304]Moons Mega Pack[/url][/center]
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/29759-1-1357862064.png[/img]
[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29759]Nebula Mega Pack[/url][/center]
author: Twisted Method

files.name: Fantasy Night Sky HD
files.changelogHtml:
Version 1.1, change log:

-New nebula.
-Nebula size decreased to fit screen better.
-Still Includes re-textured Moons & star field from version 1.0 (Unchanged).
